sentences.en: Staying calm was an exercise in self-control.
sentences.cn: 保持镇定是一种自我控制活动。

sentences.en: Avoiding temptation is one effective strategy for maintaining self-control.
sentences.cn: 远离诱惑是坚持自我控制的一个有效策略。

sentences.en: From a very early age, some children exhibit better self-control than others.
sentences.cn: 有些孩子在很小的时候就表现出比其他孩子更好的自我控制能力。
